title: (x) kni logo heavy script - Eclat {Patricia}
content:
Could someone guess what this font would be from this very limited shot? Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [kni\_01.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020054632/http:/typophile.com/files/kni_01.gif) | 7.65 KB |
author: sigurarm

comments.content:
Eclat! (I always want to add an exclamation point to that font)

[http://www.fonts.com/FindFonts/detail.htm?pid=405832](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020054632/http:/www.fonts.com/FindFonts/detail.htm?pid=405832 "http://www.fonts.com/FindFonts/detail.htm?pid=405832")
It's remarkable how popular that logo is. Could it be that humans are naturally in love with a looped 'k'?
Thanks very much for the help!
